scripts.ci: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.db:start: docker run --name nnst0knnt-express-db -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=app -e MYSQL_USER=user@app -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=password@express -p 3306:3306 -v "$(pwd)/repositories/app.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/app.sql" -d mysql:8.0 --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.db:stop: docker stop nnst0knnt-express-db 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm nnst0knnt-express-db 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.db:restart: npm run db:stop && npm run db:start
scripts.db:destroy: docker stop nnst0knnt-express-db 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm nnst0knnt-express-db 2>/dev/null || true && docker rmi mysql:8.0 2>/dev/null || true && docker volume prune -f
scripts.db:rebuild: npm run db:destroy && npm run db:start
scripts.db:connect: docker ps -q -f name=nnst0knnt-express-db >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker exec -it nnst0knnt-express-db mysql -u user@app -ppassword@express app || echo "Error: Database container is not running. Start it with 'npm run db:start'"
scripts.db:connect:root: docker ps -q -f name=nnst0knnt-express-db >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker exec -it nnst0knnt-express-db mysql -u root -ppassword || echo "Error: Database container is not running. Start it with 'npm run db:start'"
scripts.db:logs: docker ps -q -f name=nnst0knnt-express-db >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker logs nnst0knnt-express-db || echo "Error: Database container not found"
scripts.db:status: docker ps -f name=nnst0knnt-express-db || echo "No running containers found"
